sentences.en: Any head teacher who made errors like this would be chucked out.
sentences.cn: 哪个校长只要犯了这样的错误都会被开除。

sentences.en: he meekly bowed to him, as who should say ‘Proceed’.
sentences.cn: 他温顺地向他鞠躬，似乎在说“继续”。

sentences.en: I clearly empathize with the people who live in those neighborhoods.
sentences.cn: 我非常同情生活在那些地方的人们。

sentences.en: I picked first all the people who usually were left till last.
sentences.cn: 我先挑出了所有通常留到最后的人。

sentences.en: It is nearly always women who are the primary care givers.
sentences.cn: 从事初级保健护理工作的几乎都是女性。

sentences.en: It would be difficult to find two men who were more dissimilar.
sentences.cn: 很难找到彼此间差异更大的人了。

sentences.en: Northbridge is a cool, calculating and clever criminal who could strike again.
sentences.cn: 诺思布里奇是个头脑冷静、诡计多端、阴险狡诈的罪犯，他可能还会犯案。

sentences.en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
sentences.cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

sentences.en: She was a fairly rigid person who had strong religious views.
sentences.cn: 她相当顽固，宗教观念极强。

sentences.en: She wondered who had sent the flowers.
sentences.cn: 她不知道是谁送的花。

sentences.en: Singleton was a fantasist who claimed to have a karate blackbelt.
sentences.cn: 辛格尔顿是个牛皮大王，他自称有一条空手道黑带。

sentences.en: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
sentences.cn: 你是什么样的人和你想成为什么样的之间的差距就是，你做了什么。

sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentences.en: They never found out who the murderer was.
sentences.cn: 他们一直未查出谁是凶犯。

sentences.en: Try to get a feeling for the people who live here.
sentences.cn: 试着去理解在这片土地上生息的人们。

sentences.en: We know some sex offenders dupe the psychologists who assess them.
sentences.cn: 我们知道有些性犯罪者会愚弄给他们做测评的心理学家。

sentences.en: who am I to object?.
sentences.cn: 我有什么权力反对？。

sentences.en: who am I to object?.
sentences.cn: 我有什么权力反对？。

sentences.en: Who do you suppose will replace her on the show?
sentences.cn: 你觉得谁会代替她参加这场演出？

sentences.en: Who do you work for?
sentences.cn: 你为谁工作？

sentences.en: Who locked the door?
sentences.cn: 谁锁的门？

sentences.en: Who’s that guy with your wife?
sentences.cn: 和你妻子在一起的那个人是谁？

sentences.en: You can chat to other people who are online.
sentences.cn: 你可以和其他在线的人聊天。

phrases.phrase: who am I (或 are you, is he, etc.) to do something
phrases.tran_cn: 我（你或他等）有何权做某事

trans.tran_en: used to ask or talk about which person is involved, or what the name of a person is
